snippet: The former House speaker campaigned for several days in the state and had hinted that it was a must-win for him to continue in the presidential contest.
abstract: The former House speaker campaigned for several days in the state and had hinted that it was a must-win for him to continue in the presidential contest.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and ALLISON KOPICKI

headline.main: Gingrich Takes Home State of Georgia
